reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, with one noting it looks like the DKNY version, and appreciate its well-made construction, soft fabric, and color that stays true after washing. They find it comfortable and not itchy, with one mentioning it pairs beautifully with white jeans. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the lovely sweater üòç
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The sweater is stylish, it looks like the DKNY version. Its quality, soft fabric that feels lovely against the skin, not itchy ant all. Color stay true after washing. It as comfortable and cozy, with nice material. I ordered the recommended size and it fits perfect. Read more
items.author: Susan D.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfy
items.body: I purchased every color for myself, daughter and 12 y/o grand girl. 19 all together. Soft, comfy, stylish, well made and so affordable. Love wearing in office with slacks or weekend with jeans. Warm for air conditioned spaces. Caught them on limited price $9.99 to $14.99. Holds shape well. Wash and lay flat to dry. Read more
items.author: MadMax

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The quality exceeded my expectations for the price.
items.body: I‚Äôm absolutely in love with this Women‚Äôs Puff Short Sleeve Sweater Top! The fabric is soft and lightweight‚Äîperfect for spring, summer, or layering in the fall. The puff sleeves give it such a feminine, trendy look without feeling over the top. It pairs beautifully with jeans, skirts, or even dress pants for a more polished outfit. Read more
items.author: GSO

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase...will probably purchase more
items.body: Right off the bat, this top is NOT beige as advertised, it is along the lines of a Misty Rose, Dusty and/or Chilean Pink. Now that that is off my chest, I have loved this knit top/blouse, it is the second color I have purchased from this vender. I love the fit, the look and the quality of this sweater blouse. I have found the puffy sleeves just right, and fit nicely on my not so flattering aging arms. The length has been awesome, I am 5'5" and weight around 148# with a long torso and it covers nicely. A lot of times I flip the lower knitted band upward to give it that blousy look appearance. When I have worn it, I have received multiple compliments (I do say do you think this is beige and everyone agrees it is light shade of pink). It is very soft has washed extremely well through multiple washings. I prefer to hang dry my sweaters however while traveling it did see the insides of tumbling hot drier and faired just fine. I think the thickness of this top is perfect for Spring, Summer and Fall. Winter I will most likely layer it. Read more
items.author: Runner4Years

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a cute and comfortable top!
items.body: I wore the Athmile Women‚Äôs Puff Short Sleeve top and was genuinely impressed with how much I liked it. The fabric feels soft and lightweight yet holds its shape nicely, so the puff sleeves look polished without feeling stiff or restricting. It has just enough stretch to be comfortable for all-day wear and is easy to move in. The cut is very flattering. It skims without clinging and the puff sleeves give it a little extra style that makes it look dressier than a basic tee. I paired it with both jeans and a skirt and it worked beautifully for each outfit. The color stayed true after washing and it did not lose its shape or wrinkle badly, which is always a win. This top has become one of those reliable pieces I keep reaching for because it‚Äôs comfortable, stylish, and easy to dress up or down. I‚Äôm already planning to get it in another color. It's not sheer so no worries about being see-through, and the length was appropriate. No crop top here! Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love! Very soft
items.body: Very soft. Not itchy! Yay!!! That was my 1st concern. Very flattering. I‚Äôm a size 8-10 and got a medium. Just perfect. If you like a more oversize fit I would get large. I like my clothes fitted. I purchased several colors and even got a few for my older Mom as this sweater does really transcend young to older. Just a CLASSIC style. Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Elisabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: It was a great purchase. Soft, thicker material, good quality. Fit was true to size. Color matched photo. Read more
items.author: Caryl F

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this top!
items.body: Pretty for work or dress up for a night out. The fabric is soft, not scratchy. I bought in 2 other colors. Not expensive for a high quality short sleeved sweater. I love the puff shoulder to add a cute detail. It‚Äôs exactly as you see in the picture. Read more
items.author: Kelly Johnson

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-light Blue, A-mint Green, A-beige, C-dark Grey, A-red Stripe, C-green, C-white, C-blue, A-purple, A-white, A-yellow, A-black, A-greypurple, A-khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
